LightningComponentBundle.description: This component enables to display a Query Form with its related result list.

property.name: cardClass
property.label: Card CSS Class
property.description: CSS Classes for the wrapping card div

property.name: configName
property.label: Query Configuration
property.description: (Developer)Name of the Query Configuration record to be used (see sfpegList__mdt).

property.name: formRecordString
property.label: Form Object
property.description: Main configuration of the search form (object API Name + recordType ID if necessary)

property.name: searchFieldsString
property.label: Form Fields
property.description: List of fields in the search form (as name:fieldApiName)

property.name: notifChannel
property.label: Notif. Channel
property.description: Name of the sfpegCustomAction notification channel to subscribe to (to activate component display).

property.name: isDebugFine
property.label: Debug (fine) ?
property.description: Flag to show debug information for all sub-components.
